Class ApplicantServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
services.ApplicantServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IApplicantService
public class ApplicantServiceImpl extends Object implements IApplicantService
Implementation of the IApplicantService interface. Handles business logic related to BTO applicants.

    • viewApplicationStatus

      public BTOApplication viewApplicationStatus(String applicantNric)
      Description copied from interface: IApplicantService
      Finds the currently active (Pending, Successful, Booked) application for an applicant.
      Specified by:
      viewApplicationStatus in interface IApplicantService
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant.
      Returns:
      The BTOApplication object, or null if none found or only unsuccessful/withdrawn exist.

    • applyForProject

      public BTOApplication applyForProject(String applicantNric, int projectId, FlatType flatType)
      Description copied from interface: IApplicantService
      Creates a new BTO application if the applicant is eligible and doesn't have an active application. Performs eligibility checks based on age, marital status, flat type, and project availability/period.
      Specified by:
      applyForProject in interface IApplicantService
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - NRIC of the applicant.
      projectId - ID of the project to apply for.
      flatType - The specific flat type the applicant is applying for.
      Returns:
      The created BTOApplication object, or null if application failed.

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(int applicationId, String applicantNric)
      Description copied from interface: IApplicantService
      Marks an application with a withdrawal request. Manager approval is needed separately.
      Specified by:
      requestWithdrawal in interface IApplicantService
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to withdraw.
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant making the request (for verification).
      Returns:
      true if the request was successfully marked, false otherwise (e.g., app not found, already withdrawn).

    • filterProjects

      public List<Project> filterProjects(List<Project> projects, Map<String,String> filters)
      Description copied from interface: IApplicantService
      Filters a list of projects based on given criteria.
      Specified by:
      filterProjects in interface IApplicantService
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of projects to filter.
      filters - A map where keys are filter types (e.g., "neighborhood", "flatType") and values are the desired filter values.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of projects.
